Scene:
Grand Hall in Ashikaga Mansion
(Ashikaga Yakata ōhiroma / 足利館大広間)

Play: The Twenty-Four Dutiful Sons (本朝廿四孝)

Production: September 1992



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Hajimedayū (豊竹始大夫)

Toyotake Shintayū (豊竹新大夫)

Toyotake Rosetayū (豊竹呂勢大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Kiichirō (野澤喜一朗)

Takezawa Dango (竹澤団吾)



Performers:

Puppeteer Character Kashira
Yoshida Minosuke III
(吉田蓑助 (三)) 		Yatsuhashi
(腰元八つ橋) 		Musume
(娘)
Yoshida Tamaya (see also Yoshida Eikō)
(吉田玉也) 		Ujitoki Hojo
(北条氏時) 		Kuchiaki Bunshichi
(口あき文七)
Yoshida Tamakō II
(吉田玉幸 (二)) 		Kagekatsu Nagao
(長尾景勝) 		Bunshichi
(文七)
Yoshida Minotarō (see also Kiritake Kanjūrō)
(吉田蓑太郎) 		Yoshikiyo Murakami
(村上義清) 		Yokanbei
(与勘平)
Yoshida Tamamatsu III (see also Kiritake Monya)
(吉田玉松 (三)) 		Shingen Takeda
(武田信玄) 		Kōmei
(孔明)
Kiritake Kanju
(桐竹勘寿) 		Yoshiharu, the Shogun
(将軍義晴) 		Shūto
(舅)
Kiritake Monju
(桐竹紋寿) 		Lady Taoyame, Shogun's wife
(手弱女御前) 		Fukeoyama
(老女形)
Yoshida Seinosuke (see also Toyomatsu Seinosuke)
(吉田清之助) 		Shizunokata, Shogun's mistress
(愛妾賤の方) 		Nemuri no musume
(ねむりの娘)
Kiritake Itchō
(桐竹一暢) 		Shinzaemon Inoue, in fact Dosan Saito
(井上新左衛門 実は 斉藤道三) 		Ōshūto
(大舅)
